News.headline: West Ham United U23 Fixture At The Daggers 21st November
News.page_title: West Ham United U23 Fixture At The Daggers 21st November
News.URL_keywords: West Ham United U23 Fixture At The Daggers 21st November
News.short_description: Come and watch West Ham’s up and coming talent in their fifth home U23 fixture against Blackburn Rovers U23 to see if they can keep their unbeaten streak at home.
News.description:
Just coming off the back of a 1-1 draw, and a 3-2 win on penalties, with Northampton Town in the Checkatrade Trophy the Hammers are determined to push on, continue to improve and make a challenge for the title this year. 

The game will be played tonight, with a 7:00pm kick off.

West Ham United U23 Previous Results:
Northampton Town 1-1 West Ham (Checkatrade Trophy)
Nottingham Forest 1-2 West Ham
West Ham 2-1 West Brom
Middlesbrough 0-1 West Ham 
Aston Villa 2-0 West Ham  

With 11 goals involved in West Ham's first four home U23 games, and first team players such as Sofiane Feghouli and Edimilson Fernandes playing in previous U23 fixtures for West Ham, it’s got the recipe to be a great night of Football here at the Chigwell Construction Stadium.

The Night is free for West Ham Season Ticket holders, but everyone is welcome with tickets priced at £5 for adults and £3 concessions. The Clubhouse will be open to enjoy before and after the game.
